mapper.select: select * from board order by b_ref desc, b_step asc
select * from (select rownum numrow, A.* from (select * from board where ${selectbox} like '%' ||#{find} ||'%' order by b_ref desc, b_step asc) A ) where numrow >#{startrow} and numrow <= #{endrow}
select count(*) from board where ${selectbox} like '%' || #{find}|| '%'
mapper.insert: insert into board (b_seq,b_email,b_name,b_title,b_content,b_date,b_ref,b_step,b_hit,b_level) values ((select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1)from board),#{b_email},#{b_name},#{b_title},#{b_content},#{b_date},(select coalesce(max(b_ref)+1,1)from board),#{b_step},#{b_hit},#{b_level})

insert into board (b_seq,b_id,b_name,b_email, b_title,b_content,b_date,b_ref,b_step,b_hit,b_level) values ( (select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1) from board), #{b_id},#{b_name},#{b_email},#{b_title}, #{b_content},#{b_date},#{b_ip}, #{b_ref},1,#{b_hit},#{b_level} )
mapper.update: update board set b_hit=b_hit +1 where b_seq=#{b_seq}
mapper.select: select * from board where b_email=#{b_email} and b_password=#{b_password}
